name: Goofy Insanity
summary:
Get in your flying car and take to the air! The city’s traffic cruises down its usual sky-borne lanes, but these wild racers have decided to go in the wrong direction! Take control of one of many unique and colorful vehicles in a traffic-dodging trial against time.
How long does it last? Until you crash. Ranging from a gung-ho granny ready to prove her mettle to an anxious teenager uncertain about the future, these quirky characters are waiting to run the race. Avoid police, garbage trucks, school buses, and more, and see how long you can stay in the sky of this futuristic city. Keep racing to try to beat your time, and earn coins to unlock new characters and cars.
